message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,500 is too low.  Could you do $12,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment at that price.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $12,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $11,250?
